item.title: Hazelmere Road by the planters, 11th October
item.description:
Daily occurrence of various rubbish & unwanted items. As no lighting around a regular area for people to dump anything. The issue has been ongoing for the last few years but has got particularly worse in the last year.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priory Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 11th October
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington High Street, London

item.title: Abandoned forest bike, 11th October
item.description:
This Forest e bike is being parked in the same place outside the same house, repeatedly. I have moved it to a side road. I am concerned that this is suspicious and possibly a way for burglars to mark target houses as the way it has been parked is very illogical (blocking someone’s driveway). The bike is outside the Forest bike ‘use zone’. Could you please have it removed. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kent Road, Edmonton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Still there, 2 months later, 11th October
item.description:
